description: Inserts a row into a database table by taking properties out of the incoming message and store them as column value.

properties.name: tablename
properties.label: Table Name
properties.description: Provide the name of the table.

properties.name: columnnames
properties.label: Provide the names of the table columns.
properties.description: Column names of the table for which data is set.

properties.name: types
properties.label: Types
properties.description: Provide the corresponding types of the columns. Possible types are 'boolean', 'string', 'integer', 'long', 'double', 'float'

properties.name: values
properties.label: Values
properties.description: Provide the corresponding values to set. Either enter a static value or use {propertyname} to use a property value of the incoming message. To set the current time in milliseconds, use [time].
